message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to lower the price to $100?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to go down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
